name: Moonsilver Fates
description:
You are Beauxbeans, Night Witch-Cat of the Zodiac Court. 

You've been summoned to entertain the nobles with your craft, but on these nights, something is afoot. It's the New Moon, and you can feel something in the night is coming for you. 

Over the course of 15 nights, draw tarot cards and find your fate. By the end, your decisions will determine what you encounter.

Made by the duo Comfy Computer for the SOP Lunar New Year Game Jam.

Writing and Narrative Design by Camille Baumann-Jaeger.

Code, Art, Other Design by Eric Grossman.

Music by Chris Miller.
